languages.text: {n}Новое прикосновение когтя гемункула заставляет вашу плоть воспламениться в чудовищной агонии.{/n} "Ты — лишь один из моих экспериментальных материалов, и у тебя не так много вариантов, что делать дальше. Первый — разумный — быть сговорчив{mf|ым|ой} и доказать свою полезность".

{n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."
languages.original_text: {n}Новое прикосновение когтя гемункула заставляет вашу плоть воспламениться в чудовищной агонии.{/n} "Ты — лишь один из моих экспериментальных материалов, и у тебя не так много вариантов, что делать дальше. Первый — разумный — быть сговорчив{mf|ым|ой} и доказать свою полезность".

traits.locale_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn with brutal agony.{/n} "You are merely one of my experimental materials. Your options are limited. The first and reasonable one is to comply and prove your usefulness."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn with brutal agony.{/n} "You are merely one of my experimental materials. Your options are limited. The first and reasonable one is to comply and prove your usefulness."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

traits.locale_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Le simple contact avec la griffe de l'hémoncule sur votre peau vous inflige une sensation de brûlure insupportable.{/n} « À mes yeux, vous n'êtes qu'un matériau parmi tant d'autres. Plusieurs solutions s'offrent à vous. La première, qui est aussi la plus raisonnable, est de m'obéir et ainsi de me prouver votre valeur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le simple contact avec la griffe de l'hémoncule sur votre peau vous inflige une sensation de brûlure insupportable.{/n} « À mes yeux, vous n'êtes qu'un matériau parmi tant d'autres. Plusieurs solutions s'offrent à vous. La première, qui est aussi la plus raisonnable, est de m'obéir et ainsi de me prouver votre valeur. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}血伶人的利爪触碰着你的身体，你的血肉在痛苦中熊熊燃烧。{/n}“你不过是我的实验材料罢了，你没什么选择。第一个选择，也是目前最合理的选择，就是服从我的命令，证明你的价值。”
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."

traits.locale_text: {n}血伶人的利爪触碰着你的身体，你的血肉在痛苦中熊熊燃烧。{/n}“你不过是我的实验材料罢了，你没什么选择。第一个选择，也是目前最合理的选择，就是服从我的命令，证明你的价值。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Die Berührung der Klaue des Haemonculus lässt dein Fleisch vor Schmerzen brennen.{/n} "Ihr seit nicht mehr als eines meiner experimentellen Materialien. Ihr habt wenige Optionen. Die erste Option, und mit Abstand die vernünftigste, ist mir schlicht zu gehorchen und dadurch Euren Wert zu demonstrieren."
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Berührung der Klaue des Haemonculus lässt dein Fleisch vor Schmerzen brennen.{/n} "Ihr seit nicht mehr als eines meiner experimentellen Materialien. Ihr habt wenige Optionen. Die erste Option, und mit Abstand die vernünftigste, ist mir schlicht zu gehorchen und dadurch Euren Wert zu demonstrieren."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}El toque de la garra del Hemónculo hace que tu piel arda de dolor.{/n} «No eres más que uno de mis materiales experimentales. Te doy dos opciones. La primera opción, y la más razonable, es obedecerme y demostrar lo que vales».
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."

traits.locale_text: {n}El toque de la garra del Hemónculo hace que tu piel arda de dolor.{/n} «No eres más que uno de mis materiales experimentales. Te doy dos opciones. La primera opción, y la más razonable, es obedecerme y demostrar lo que vales».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}ハモンキュラスの爪に触れると、肉体が焼けるように痛む。{/n}「お前は私の実験材料の一つでしかない。選択肢は少ないぞ。最初の選択肢は、最も合理的な物だが、服従することであり、それによって自分の価値を証明することだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハモンキュラスの爪に触れると、肉体が焼けるように痛む。{/n}「お前は私の実験材料の一つでしかない。選択肢は少ないぞ。最初の選択肢は、最も合理的な物だが、服従することであり、それによって自分の価値を証明することだ」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Haimonkulus'un pençesinin dokunuşu, bedeninin acı içinde yanmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Sen benim deney materyallerimdensin, o kadar. Pek bir seçeneğin yok. İlk seçenek ki bu en rasyonel seçenektir, itaat etmek ve bu sayede de değerini kanıtlamak."
languages.original_text: {n}The touch of the Haemonculus's claw makes your flesh burn in agony.{/n} "You are no more than one of my experimental materials. You have few options. The first option, and by far the most reasonable, is to obey and thereby demonstrate your value."

traits.locale_text: {n}Haimonkulus'un pençesinin dokunuşu, bedeninin acı içinde yanmasına neden oluyor.{/n} "Sen benim deney materyallerimden birisin, o kadar. Az sayıda seçeneğin var. İlk seçenek, ki kendisi en rasyonel seçenektir, itaat etmek ve bu sayede de değerini kanıtlamak."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
